Description:
Crow, this is not a game, so his strange interactive fairy tale. You control a raven, which located on the instructions of a behind the scenes character performs different tasks. At first, ask prismirit raging scarecrow, knows what task, in general. But soon you will fight with the giant and the hunt for the soldiers of the mysterious Baron.
Crow Each level is a piece of terrain (all three-dimensional), over which hovers a proud black bird. She flies to wherever you point your finger. And the first thing you want to stick to the obvious object of interest that stands out among the landscape, there is a huge monster or a beautiful castle. So you start to fight with the enemies. But first, it is recommended to study the level, fly over them back and forth to find the bonuses. They help pump capacity crow. For example, to increase the frequency of attacks or health regeneration.
